SIC_Code: (1499) Miscellaneous Nonmetallic Minerals, Except Fuels
Description: Operator of a market dynamic exploration and production company focusing on building a large reserve and acreage base within the three most prolific oil and gas plays in the United States. Richland Resources Ltd was incorporated in 2004. It is a holding company of a group of companies involved in the mining and marketing of the rare gemstone tanzanite via its subsidiary companies. Through its subsidiary, TanzaniteOne Mining Limited, the group holds the mining licence over a property containing a proportion of known tanzanite resource. It also conducts outside buying, operates beneficiation facilities, manages tanzanite grading and certification and markets both rough and polished tanzanite as well as exploration for other coloured gemstones. The group comprises of five reportable segments: Mining: the extraction of rough tanzanite; Trading: the purchase and sale of rough tanzanite; Exploration: the exploration of other coloured gemstones; Marketing: the sale of cut and rough tanzanite and the promotion of tanzanite; and Cut and polished tanzanite and jewellery: the purchase and resale of cut and polished tanzanite and jewellery.
Title: Chief Executive Officer

Description: Developer of shark-mitigation technology. The company is focused on development of non-invasive products for water users to mitigate shark attacks. Its products include Clever Buoy, a near-shore shark detection and warning system for use at beaches; and marine apparel designed to either camouflage swimmers in the water column, or with colors to overtly present them as unlike any shark prey.
